summary: This is an email chain from July 16, 2019, forwarding a 'Hotline tracker' spreadsheet related to the Epstein case. It involves communication between an NYPD detective from the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force and FBI personnel, indicating coordination on tip or information tracking.

persons.name: C Detective
persons.role: NYPD Detective, Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force
persons.context: Appears as the initial sender or recipient in the email chain, representing the NYPD's involvement in the investigation.

connections.description: Connected via email communication regarding the 'Hotline tracker', indicating coordination between NYPD and another government agency (OGA) on the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Hotline tracker update
events.description: An email with a 'Hotline tracker' spreadsheet was sent and forwarded among law enforcement personnel, tracking tips or information related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from July 2019 showing inter-agency coordination (NYPD and FBI) on the Epstein investigation.
It references a 'Hotline tracker' spreadsheet, suggesting an active tip line or information collection effort was ongoing.
The involvement of the NYPD's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force indicates the local law enforcement role in the case.
